Package jklann.hqmf

Class Summary
HQMF Jeff Klann - 7/9/2012 My HQMF resources for Jersey.
JerseyServer Jeff Klann - 7/9/2012 Borrowed almost exactly from the example on Jersey's site, this starts up a Grizzly HTTPD server with Jersey running inside using the appropriate HQMF resources.
MyProps Jeff Klann - 7/9/2012 A very simple properties container which loads and holds hqmf.properties.
ProcessorErrorHandler Jeff Klann - 7/9/2012 A somewhat goofy error handler for Xalan transforms.
Processors Jeff Klann - 6/2012 Does all the hard work of actually calling Xalan on the transforms, which it loads from a directory in .properties.
